sys_script_include.description:
You can leverage this script incude from your CMDB Integration Studio Application Data Source [cmdb_inst_application_feed] (AKA the robust transform definition).
PREVIEW ONLY 1. Check the "Execute Before Script" property on the form. 2. In the Before Script, populate the function with the following code which will execute this transform preview. Also by default it will automatically set the import set row to "Skipped" so that no actual CMDB updates are applied.
new x_156954_sgc_enhan.SGCEnhanceTransformPreview().previewBatch(input, runId);
3. After running an import, you can review the Import Preview Result table to understand how your CMDB data would be imported into ServiceNow after transformation.
PROCESS AND PREVIEW 1.
sys_script_include.name: SGCEnhanceTransformPreview
